summary: A contemporary documentary covering the Great British punk rock explosion of 1977.
cast: Gaye Advert|Jack Airport|Arturo Bassick|Chelsea|Robert Collins|Miles A. Copeland III|Jayne County|Andrew Czezowski|Henry Daze|Paul Dean|Jim Doak|Lorry Driver|The Electric Chairs|Manic Esso|Carey Fortune|Vic Godard|B.P. Harding|Topper Headon|The Jam|The Jolt|Mick Jones|The Killjoys|Lora Logic|Paul Myers|Gene October|Paul Packham|Howard Pickup|Kevin Rowland|Iain Shedden|Paul Simonon|T.V. Smith|James Christopher Stevenson|The Stranglers|Peter Stride|Joe Strummer|Rob Symmons|Howard Wall|Paul Weller|X-Ray Spex|Rick Buckler|Bruce Foxton|Bob Geldof|Poly Styrene
title: Punk in London
